name: The Bus Don't Stop (because if it does, it explodes)
name_original: The Bus Don't Stop (because if it does, it explodes)
description:
Drive to bus stops and pick up / drop off passengers by driving past them.   How high can you get your trips completed score before you explode?

----- Credits -----

A Game By Robby Zinchak
Sfx & Music By Macaulay Szymanski / Sound Civet
Vo/recording By Joshua Duchene
Additional In-game Vo By Anna Bumgarner

Made in 48hrs for Hype Jam on August 2-4, 2019.

Full credits & assets used in README.txt
